positions.title: ARCHIES LIMITED
positions.description:
 Installation & Configuration of SQL Server 2008/2008 R2/2012/2014/2016 .
 Experience in server level tuning, query level tuning and troubleshooting performance issue using SQL Server Profiler, Database Tuning Adviser.
 Checking the General Health growth of the servers and the databases.
 Providing 24x7 technical database supports for SQL Database systems.
 Continuously monitoring and updating the Backup & Recovery strategy and also monitoring scheduled jobs of backup and restore procedure for database
 Having experience on database backup and restorations.
 Technical proficiency in handling Microsoft SQL Database related issues both in production and non-production environments with expertise in doing rigorous troubleshooting on Database Backup, Restore, Log shipping, Mirroring, Clustering, AlwaysOn etc.
❖ Checking storage – Validate we have sufficient storage on our drives to support databases and
backup
❖ SQL: good knowledge in creating, altering the table etc. using DDL, DML, TCL.
❖ Having good knowledge in Sub-queries and Co-related sub queries, groups and grouping
functions.
❖ Fetching the Data from Tables by using different types of Joins like Left, Right and Self join etc.
…
see more
